mastercool-70070.description:
Features

  • Hand-operated ratchet design bends tubes easily
  • Bends: 3/8, 1/2, 5/8, 3/4 and 7/8" O.D. soft tubing
  • Includes heavy duty tube cutter for (1/8 - 1 1/8" O.D. tubing)
  • Includes inner-outer reamer for (3/16 - 1 1/2" O.D. tubing)
  • Comes in custom molded case
mastercool-70070.name: Mastercool 70070 "Ratchet Style" Tube Bender Kit

felco-c16e.description:
.79" ACSR Electrical Cable Cutter (when swithced off)

Features

  • Reliable: unbreakable hardened handles made of forged aluminium with a lifetime guarantee / blades and fastenings in high-quality hardened steel / parts subject to wear and tear can be replaced
  • Efficient: blade geometry specially developed for cutting electrical cables / clean, precise cut without crushing the cable thanks to the triangular cutting system / easy and durable cutting adjustment
  • Ergonomic: lightweight handles / helpful lever effect / comfortable plastic coating
  • High-strength blades. Hardened and tempered knives for cutting the strongest of cables
  • Blades designed for electric cables. Blade geometry specially developed for cutting electric cables (only when not live)
  • Triangular cutting action. FELCO's innovative triangular cut allows you to progressively cut cable wires and at the same time avoid squashing of strands. Thanks to this feature, it is generally not necessary to tie the cable before the cut
  • Forged aluminum handles. Lightweight, strong and sturdy thanks to special aluminum alloys and advanced precision forging methods

Applications

  • Cables, wire-drawing mills
  • Rail transport
  • Springs industry
  • Electricity, telecommunications
  • Oil industry
  • Gondola lifts, cable cars, ski-lifts, life-lines
felco-c16e.name: Felco C16E .79" ACSR Electrical Cable Cutter

rothenberger-11078.description:
11078, Expander Tool Model A1, 1-3/8", 1-5/8", 2-1/8", 2-5/8", 3-1/8", 4-1/8"

Includes: Graduated expander with handle, without special ratchet handle.

For expanding, reducing and calibrating thick walled pipes, Ø 35 – 108 mm (1.3/8 - 4.1/8“), as well as the production of tapers.

For efficient, fitting-free installation of pipes in sanitary, heating, gas, refrigeration and air-conditioning systems

Features:

  • Affordable alternative when laying larger pipe dimensions with a considerable saving of soldering materials
  • Expand without changing tools with the 6 size step Expander Full bearing of the expander head segments allows heavy loads
  • Optimum adjustment of the socket size and capillary gap with the positive fine adjustment
  • Optimised force transmission with the trapezoidal screw thread with self-lubricating bronze socket
  • Guide guarantees a perfect centred position and uniform capillary gap with 6 rivets and guiding ridge
rothenberger-11078.name: Rothenberger 11078 1-3/8" - 4-1/8" Graduated Expander A1

felco-c112.description:

felco-c112.name: Felco C112 1/2" Steel Cable Cutter

milton-s-120.description:
1/4" NPT Lever Style Blow Gun

Features:

  • 1/4" national pipe thread
  • Maximum inlet pressure of 150 pounds per square inch
  • Thread nozzle measures 1/8" - 27

Full flow control blow gun comes with extra large hang up hook for easy storage. This safety lever hook blow gun is OSHA compliant as it limits pressure to 30 PSI when dead ended. Regulated compressed air lines offer a maximum of 150 PSI, with a maximum nozzle pressure of 30 PSI. Delivers up to 10.6 SCFM at 100 PSI. 1/4" NPT air inlet.
milton-s-120.name: Milton s-120 1/4" NPT Lever Style Blow Gun
